PERSONAL DETAILS



 
Diploma in Web Development and Management-  Ultimo College of Sydney Australia – 2015

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
1 
 
8+ years of working experience in .Net (C# - MVC, Angular, Web API, Dot Net Core) software - 
Web development, including web/windows service/desktop/console application.  
Expertise in .Net framework, Object Oriented Programming. 
Practical experience in Visual Studio IDE 2003 – 2005 – 2008 – 2010 – 2012 – 2015 - 2017 
Good knowledge in Design pattern. 
Good at database administration: MS SQL. 
Eager to learn new tools, technologies. 
Ability to study new technologies quickly. 
Adapt for project challenges.  
Never give up attitude. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
Web Technologies: PHP, WordPress, Magento, ASP, ASP.NET MVC, Java Script, HTML5, CSS, MVC, 
WPF, Umbraco, AngularJS, Angular 4 - 6, DotNet Core2 API, Web API 
 
Development, Design Tools: Microsoft Unit Test, Microsoft Expression Blend, SVN, TFS, GIT, Source 
Tree, Docker 
 
Databases: MS SQL Server,MySQL, PosgreSQL, Oracle. 
 
Operating Systems: Windows 7/2008 Server, Plesk Hosting, Windows Azure,  AWS Web Services, 
Jira, Confluence, Rally. 
 
Other: OOP, MVVM, Embedded C & Assembly, Database Design, Three Layers, Java Programing, 
Cloud Azure, Crystal Report, XML, AJAX, Responsive Web Design, LessCSS, Big Data, AWS Web 
Services as EC2, ELB, ASG, S3, Cloud Formation, Cloud Front etc. 
OTHER SKILLS/QUALITIES 
 
Foreign Languages 
o English: Advance level. 
o Japanese: Beginer level. 
 
Personal Qualities 
o Good problem solving and troubleshooting skills. 
o Good in managing things. 
o Strong leadership and motivational skills.  
o Unmatchable communication skills in written and verbal both. 
o Ability to produce best result in pressure situation. 
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
2 
o Skill to work in a team and independently. 
o Ability to grasp and learn quickly new technologies. 
o Good at self-studying skill.

requirements. 
CERTIFICATES and AWARDS 
o Best English performance in Embassy School – Sydney Australia. 
o IELTS 5.0 Cerfication and EAP III Certification. 
o Best Star Performer in Quarter III at TMA Solution Company. 
o Best Performer in Quarter IV 2018 at FPT Software Company. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
From June 2009 – July 2010 FAST SOFTWARE COMPANY  
Project Description: FAST SOFTWARE APPLICATION 
Develop Software accounting to Web Application Accounting to support customers managed 
Account Online. 
Project size: 6 persons  – 1 years. 
Role: Desktop Application Developer. 
Programming languages: C# - ASP.NET , MS SQL Database. 
Responsibilities: Implement User Stories/Requirement from Manager. 
From August 2012 – December 2015 – MONEY PLUS IN AUSTRALIA  
Project Description: MONEY PLUS LOCAL APPLICATION – LOCAL AUSTRALIAN COMPANY 
Develop ASP original website to ASP.net MVC of website front end and then develop backend 
application including Analysis, Design and Coding Application. Application supports all customer 
services of 10 stores in Australia to managed customers loan money and transfer money from bank 
to client with money their loan. 
Project size: 4 persons (all foreigner co-workers) – 2 years. 
Role: Web Developer. 
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
3 
Programming languages: HTML5/CSS3, C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL Database, connect with 
Commonthwealth bank and NAB bank in Australia. 
Responsibilities: Implement User Stories/Requirement from Manager. 
From June 2016 – June 2017 – TMA 
Project Description: CI2 Anywhere Framework and AWS - TECHNOLOGYONE OF AUSTRALIAN CLIENTS 
Enhancement functions of Ci2 Anywhere Framework and AWS of TechonologyOne Clients 
Company in Brisbane Australia. Application supports over 1000 Clients University, Council 
Australian, Bank and Business. Moreover, Application also run perfectly on all devices laptop, 
desktop, mobile, tablet etc. 
Project size: 80 persons in VN (My Team Cloud 6 persons). 
Role: Web Developer. 
Programming languages: C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL, Ci Anywhere framework, AWS. 
Responsibilities: Implement User Stories/Requirement from customers. 
From June 2017 – August 2017 – FPT Software 
Project Description : AVOCADO – HALLIBURTON of AMERICAN CLIENTS 
Avocado include two projects: Mission Control and Mission Control Web Enabler

Project size: 10 persons. 
Role: Web Developer. 
Programming languages: HTML5/CSS3, C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL Database, Umbraco CMS 
and Angular JS Framework Front End. 
Responsibilities: Implement User Stories/Requirement from Manager. 
From August 2017 – Jan 2018 – FPT Software 
Project Description: SICS 
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
4 
Maintain: Structural Integrity Compliance System (SICS) is an integrity management tool, used for 
the management of underwater assets. The system is targeted for external and internal use. It will be 
hosted in PETRONAS Internet environment. 
Project size: 5 persons. 
Role: Web Developer. 
Programming languages: HTML5/CSS3, C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL Database, Umbraco CMS 
and Angular JS Framework Front End, Angular 4 & 5, Web API , Dot Net Core 2.0 API. 
Responsibilities: Implement User Stories/Requirement from Manager. 
From Jan 2018 – Jun 2018 – FPT Software 
Project Description: BAL – AMERICAN CLIENTS 
Maintain: Developing web application for processing  immigration documents all over the world. 
Build up web application with AngularJS and Web API and also managed code with GIT, VS Team 
2015.  
Project size: 30 persons. 
Role: Team lead (3 members) and Web Developer. 
Programming languages: HTML5/CSS3, C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL Database and AngularJS 
Framework Front End, Web API. 
Responsibilities: Implement User Stories/Requirement from Manager on Ralley. 
From July 2018 – October 2018 – FPT Software 
Project Description: HSSE – ONSITER of PERTRONAS MALAYSIAN CLIENTS 
Maintain: Developing web application HSSE for managing incidences of clients and then Petronas 
uses this app to process incidences and grievances. 
Build up web application with MVC and IP Frameworks and also managed code with VS Team 2015.  
Project size: 10 persons. 
Role: Web Developer. 
Programming languages: HTML5/CSS3, C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL Database and MVC 4, IP 
Framework. 
Responsibilities: Implement Task Front End and Back End from Lead on SRS. 
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
5 
From October 2018 – Untill now – FPT Software 
Project Description: DAAS  – of DELL AMERICAN CLIENTS 
Maintain: Propose solution technical back end to use dot net core frame wok and Developing web  
portal application DAAS for managing data source , databricks, catalog, glossory, BI report in Azure and 
provide API for thrid party. 
Build up web application with Azure Cloud by two app services: one app service for API Backend 
dot net core and other app service run with front end Angular 6.  
Project size: 15 persons. 
Role: Technical Lead backend and Web Developer. 
Programming languages: HTML5/CSS3, C# - ASP.NET with MVC pattern, MS SQL Database and MVC, Agular 
6 Framework front end and Dot net Core Framework 2.1 and build source web host on Azure Cloud. 
Responsibilities: Implement Task Back End Dot Net Core 2.1 , Azure deployment with Jira and Confluence. 
INTERESTS AND ACTIVITIES 
- 
Embedded programming, Robot, Automation, Mobile Apps etc  
- 
Open Source Project/Website 
- 
Writing technical sharing blog: Advanced algorithms, emerging technologies 
- 
Playing badminton, tennis, table tennis, swimming, travel, listen to music. 
- 
Volunteer activities. 
- 
Join in professional meeting about technology and business. 
CAREER OBJECTIVES 
-

in Australia around 6 years and onsiter in Kulua Lumpur Malaysia 6 months contract. 
- 
My current objective is that I will try my best to achieve a solution architecture position. I 
would like to specialize in consulting, developing and training all the solutions for enterprise 
operation and personnel training management used Microsoft technology. 
- 
A challenging position as a techno savvy, which would enhance my knowledge in my field and 
experience in building Real-time Applications. 
- 
To acquire a challenging career with a solid company utilizing the opportunity to offer proven 
and developing skills within the company. 
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
6 
- 
To achieve a career driven by the innovation in the field of Embedded Technology that offers 
challenges stimulates creativity and boosts professional growth and also to bring a complete 
change in the way we perceive the technology through my innovation.  
Hai Duong’s CV - Confidential 
7
